Hello Francisco Scaramanga.
Today after i received your favourable reply ,i went straight to the lawyers office to hold an elaborate meeting as regards procuring all relevant legal documents that will empower you legally to claim my late clients funds.
 
Thus ,The lawyer explained that in an inheritance claim such as yours where the deceased died inter estate,that is without leaving a will . 
 
The following steps will be taken to achieve our goal under normal legitimate procedure.
 
1, An affidavit has to be sworn at the court in support of your claim as the next of kin to late Mr Christian Eich.
 
2. Then with this affidavit,a letter of administration will be applied for at the probate registry.
 
3.Immediately the probate registry issues this letter of administration in your name, it will prove legally in the UK that  they have searched and there is no dispute in the administration of late Mr Eich's estate.With this letter of administration you have been legally recognised as the next of kin to late Mr Eich.
 
4.With  this letter of administration which makes you the legal next of kin to the deceased,your claim will be filled for at the storage company for them to make you the beneficiary of the funds .They will have no option than to give you full authority to the funds since you have all the legal documents.
Further more , after a long negotiation the lawyer said that his fees will be 22,000 Pounds.After further negotiation i was able to convince him that we will pay him the fees at the end of the transaction and he agreed.
 
He also said that we will pay for the cost of the legal documents .That is all the government fees and  duties for the legal documents.He said he will let me know the exact cost by Monday.
 
In this transaction i want us to conclude as quick as possible as time is not our best friend .Please try to also expedite all actions from your side to avoid unnecessary delays.
 
As regards your investment ideas i believe that they are very lucrative but i want to also suggest that we should also buy some real estate and stocks with part of the funds.From my past experience ,It is usually better to spread  your investments in different areas .
 
I will try to send you my picture as soon as possible.You are also free to visit UK for the transaction.
 
All that i have written in this mail  is the whole truth and the best legal procedure that will lead to our success in this lucrative transaction.
 
I am waiting for your urgent reply.
 
Many thanks in advance.
 
Truly yours.
Charles

Hello.

I feel very sorry to interrupt your peace since you are not expecting to receive any mail from me. However, I was obliged to do so due to the importance and urgency of the message. I crave your indulgence, and want to reassure you that I mean well and that it is only for our mutual good. So please do not be embarrassed or suspicious.

The details of my proposal are as follows. I work as a private financial adviser in Birmingham .

Some years ago I was attending a business luncheon in Berlin, Germany where i met a German based business man ,Mr Christian Eich, we discussed about his intentions to invest in the United kingdom. Then some months later we met again in London, and I assisted him, to make a deposit of fifteen million five hundred thousand US dollars [ 15.5million US Dollars in a storage company in UK for onward investments after six months in 2002 .I had an agreement with him to set up an investment portfolio.I was his portfolio manager.

Upon Maturity of the first six months, I sent a routine notification to his forwarding address, to confirm if he wanted to continue rolling it over another duration, but I got no response from him.

After another six months, I sent another reminder to know if he wanted to continue rolling over the interest, but i still did not get any response from him. I had to make personal efforts to reach him, since i was his portfolio manager that personally guided him to make this deposit and surprisingly I discovered that my client was aboard the Concorde Air France flight AF4590 which crashed, killing all passengers on board and including his wife Andrea and only two children. Please click here http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/europe/859479.stm
After months of investigations, all attempts to trace any his relatives to him proved fruitless, as it was discovered that the depositor (Mr. Christain Eich) did not declare any next of kin or relations in all his official documents.
Since then, the money has been in the storage company and nobody has come to make claims and I believe 'NO ONE' will ever come forward to make claims, since the entire family was eventually wiped out. I have made efforts to locate a member of his family with strong biological links to my late client without success.

The search to find a close relation is one that has consumed time and resources. My proposal is to package and present you as next of kin to my deceased client and process the fixed deposit for transfer to you for our mutual benefit. The transaction will be executed under normal legitimate arrangements. So that you and I can benefit from this 'FREE MONEY', since it now belongs to nobody.

Moreover, it is pertinent to note that it is not risky .
NOTE: I know there may be scams and junk mails flying here and there on the internet but certainly, this is not one. Please do not fail to understand that in spite of all that, opportunities of this kind still abound. If you have ever wished or prayed for something good to come your way, now I urge you to take this message seriously and with an open mind. You could never know. This may be an answer to your prayers. So please give it a benefit of doubt, and join me with trust.
I am assuring you very strongly that you will never be disappointed.
Please reply urgently and furnish your TELEPHONE AND FAX NUMBERS, for further details.
Treat as strictly confidential.
Best regards,
Charles Graham

[A classic Dead Bank Customer letter. But you knew that.]

Charles,
 
Thank you for your prompt reply.
 
A few things though, as the nature of my work is extremely sensitive and secretive I need to know how you got hold of my email address, believe me at least one person's job depends on your response.

I hope to hear from you soon.
 
Regards
 
Francisco Scaramanga

Date:	Fri, 27 Apr 2007

Hello Charles,
 
Thank you for your honesty, you have prevented me from changing my whole communication structure, reconfiguring the Solex and ultimately saving my assistant's job by being honest and telling me it was luck that our paths crossed. An old associate of mine called Kananga used to believe quite strongly in luck, fate, destiny, tarot what have you.
 
Now, despite having an English mother, and knowing the language I tend to be wary of the English these days (bad experience back in the 70's). But that was then and this is now, Please see below my responses to your questions:
 
1,Age - 54
 
2,Marital status - Single ( Although they say love is required whenever i'm hired)
 
3, Occupation. Security Consultant
 
4,What kind of projects have you handled in the past? There was the Hai-Fat incident, but I'd rather not talk about that. Lazar a Portugese Goldsmith living in Macau has worked with me on a few small gold projects. There was the Solex debacle that was (ironically as you are English) ruined by an irritating Englishman from a company called Universal Exports Ltd (don't suppose you have come across them?)
 
5, Your investments ideas .
 
The Bottoms Up Club in Kowloon is a wonderful establishment that entertains many businessmen who venture into Hong-Kong, the hostess Chew Mee is among the very best. Perhaps we can look at opening more clubs of this nature through the South China Sea area? I normally work alone (with a great success rate too may I add) but I am willing to take on partners who I feel I can trust.
 
6,Address
 
Ko Kow-Phing-Khan 
Phra nakorn
(Near Khao San)
Thailand
I am rarely there but I do use this address for all my dealings.
 
7,Private telephone and cell numbers.
 
I tend to have very little communication with anyone (they rarely see me coming). Primarily for security purposes, I do most of my communication via email. The island I live on tends to have poor telephone lines, but you are more than welcome to call my Personal Assistant Nik Nak at the following number: (66)2537-8111-55, but depending on the weather you may not get through.
 
Nik Nak tends to deal with most of the day-to-day matters of my operation, leaving me to concentrate on what I do best. If you could copy him in on any future communication that would be most helpful as I am shortly leaving for Macau for an appointment with Lazar for the latest drop-off. Nik Nak does tend to have a bit of a way about him, but you will soon get used to it. He can be contacted on xxxxxx@xxxxxx.xxx
 
Let me know what you think of my proposals and feel free to voice any ideas of your own, like I say this is one of several targets on my hitlist, so I cannot devote a great amount of time, but I am happy to help. That said if Nik Nak wants to get his hands on my money, then he can get his little legs going and do more than serve the damn drinks.
I think a photograph of you would be helpful going forward. If I really feel I can trust you then I will send one of myself and Nik Nak to you.
 
Regards
 
Francisco Scaramanga

messages.body:
Date:	Tue, 8 May 2007

Charles,
 
I must say that I am outraged at this email. I have been dealing with you in good faith since you sought me out to help you. What I said then stands now, I am a busy man but would look to help you out as this seemed like an easy way to make some cash without the normal risks that I have to endure in my working life.
 
You say that I do not sound professional, yet you have just admitted to offering my personal assistant cash on the side. I'll have you know that Nik Nak is very well paid (a bit too well if you ask me) for the work he does. As Nik Nak also knows, he stands to inherit the lot when I do eventually meet with the bullet that has my name on it (so to speak).  That said, I am willing to overlook this matter for now, as I know what Nik Nak can be like.
 
I do not need to prove anything to you Charles, my work is known throughout the far east and various channels throughout the globe. Whenever I am given a target, I hit it, I get paid. The nature of my work requires a lot of secrecy (I told you that at the start) and to be quite frank with you, my other work has no baring on this matter whatsoever. I also remind you that I gave you my address and my telephone number, whether or not you chose to do your homework was upto you.
 
Frankly Charles, I think this maybe more hassle than it's worth. I am here till Saturday at which point I leave to go to Lagos for a few days on business. I await your apology and reply before I entertain the idea of continuing modalities.
 
Regards
 
Francisco Scaramanga
